pkgmetadata.longdescription: Epiar is a space adventure/combat game written in C with SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer). It is absolutely free (released under the General Public License v2). In Epiar, you begin as a shuttle pilot in a galaxy generally ruled by anarchy, with few stable governments and numerous rebel factions. You start your adventure off doing whatever you want, but generally trying to save up money for a new starship, and your adventure takes off from there ...
